examples.name: Movie Recommendation - Action Films
examples.description: Find trending action movies similar to popular franchises

body.inspiration: I want to discover action movies similar to Marvel and Fast & Furious franchises, preferably from the last 5 years with high ratings

examples.name: Artist Discovery - Pop Music
examples.description: Find pop artists similar to Taylor Swift and Ariana Grande

body.inspiration: I'm looking for pop artists similar to Taylor Swift and Ariana Grande, preferably trending artists with high streaming numbers

examples.name: Destination Travel - Summer 2024
examples.description: Find trending travel destinations for summer 2024

body.inspiration: I want to discover trending travel destinations for summer 2024, preferably beach locations with good weather and cultural attractions

examples.name: Video Game - RPG Recommendations
examples.description: Find RPG games similar to popular titles

body.inspiration: I'm looking for RPG video games similar to The Witcher 3 and Skyrim, preferably with open world and fantasy elements

examples.name: TV Show - Drama Series
examples.description: Find drama TV shows similar to popular series

body.inspiration: I want to discover drama TV shows similar to Breaking Bad and Game of Thrones, preferably with complex characters and high production value

examples.name: Book - Fantasy Novels
examples.description: Find fantasy books similar to popular series

body.inspiration: I'm looking for fantasy books similar to Harry Potter and Lord of the Rings, preferably with magic systems and epic adventures

examples.name: Brand - Tech Companies
examples.description: Find tech brands similar to Apple and Google

body.inspiration: I want to discover tech brands similar to Apple and Google, preferably innovative companies with strong brand recognition

examples.name: Podcast - True Crime
examples.description: Find true crime podcasts similar to popular ones

body.inspiration: I'm looking for true crime podcasts similar to Serial and My Favorite Murder, preferably with investigative journalism and storytelling

examples.name: Place - Coffee Shops
examples.description: Find coffee shops in trendy neighborhoods

body.inspiration: I want to discover trendy coffee shops in hip neighborhoods, preferably with good ambiance and specialty coffee

examples.name: Person - Tech Influencers
examples.description: Find tech influencers similar to popular ones

body.inspiration: I'm looking for tech influencers similar to Elon Musk and Mark Zuckerberg, preferably innovative entrepreneurs and thought leaders

complex_test.name: Complex Test - Artist with Location
complex_test.description: Complex query with multiple filters and signals

body.inspiration: Find pop artists similar to Taylor Swift who are trending in Los Angeles, with high streaming numbers and social media presence

audience_test_1.name: Audience Test - Young Adults
audience_test_1.description: Test that should trigger audience search for young adults (LLM should generate: [{"keyword": "young adults", "parentType": "urn:audience:life_stage"}, {"keyword": "18-25", "parentType": "urn:audience:life_stage"}])

body.inspiration: Find movies popular among young adults aged 18-25, preferably action and comedy genres from the last 2 years

audience_test_2.name: Audience Test - Tech Professionals
audience_test_2.description: Test that should trigger audience search for tech professionals (LLM should generate: [{"keyword": "tech professionals", "parentType": "urn:audience:professional_area"}, {"keyword": "software developers", "parentType": "urn:audience:professional_area"}])

body.inspiration: Find tech brands and products popular among tech professionals and software developers, preferably innovative startups

audience_test_3.name: Audience Test - Travel Enthusiasts
audience_test_3.description: Test that should trigger audience search for travel enthusiasts

body.inspiration: Find travel destinations popular among adventure travelers and backpackers, preferably budget-friendly locations with outdoor activities

audience_test_4.name: Audience Test - Students
audience_test_4.description: Test that should trigger audience search for students

body.inspiration: Find books and study materials popular among college students and university students, preferably academic and educational content

audience_test_5.name: Audience Test - Parents
audience_test_5.description: Test that should trigger audience search for parents

body.inspiration: Find family-friendly movies and TV shows popular among parents with young children, preferably educational and entertaining content

audience_test_6.name: Audience Test - Gamers
audience_test_6.description: Test that should trigger audience search for gamers

body.inspiration: Find video games popular among gamers and gaming enthusiasts, preferably action and adventure games

audience_test_7.name: Audience Test - Fitness Enthusiasts
audience_test_7.description: Test that should trigger audience search for fitness enthusiasts

body.inspiration: Find fitness brands and products popular among fitness enthusiasts and gym-goers, preferably workout equipment and supplements

audience_test_8.name: Audience Test - Travelers
audience_test_8.description: Test that should trigger audience search for travelers

body.inspiration: Find travel destinations popular among adventure travelers and backpackers, preferably budget-friendly locations with outdoor activities
